so

sense.def:
Kadar neka oseba ali stvar naredi nekaj
and so does another one
, tudi druga oseba ali stvar naredi enako kot prva.

seg.quote: Etta laughed heartily and so did he.
His shoes are brightly polished; so is his briefcase.

sense.def:
Z izrazoma
so
in
so that
uvedemo rezultat okoliščin, ki smo jih pravkar omenili.

seg.quote: He speaks very little English, so I talked to him through an interpreter.
The door was open, so that anyone passing could look in.

sense.def:
Z izrazoma
so that
in
so as
navedemo vzrok, zakaj nekdo ravna tako, kot smo pravkar povedali.

seg.quote: He has to earn lots of money so that he can buy his children nice food and clothes.
They went on foot, so as not to be heard.

sense.def:
Besedo
so
lahko uporabimo v pogovoru, ko želimo nekaj preveriti, povzeti ali preiti na naslednji del pogovora ali razprave.

seg.quote: So it wasn't just an accident?
And so for now, goodnight.
So what are the advantages of nuclear energy?

sense.def:
Besedo
so
lahko uporabimo, ko želimo povedati, da se je nekaj zgodilo tako, kot opisujemo.

seg.quote: They have the eyes so located as to give a wide field of vision.
The others are moving right to left, like so.

sense.def:
Z besedo
so
lahko opišemo ali poudarimo stopnjo ali obseg nečesa.

seg.quote: I'm so glad you could come.
Don't go so fast.
The engine was so hot the air around it shimmered.

sense.def:
Besedo
so
lahko uporabimo pred izrazi kot
much
in
many

seg.quote: We will only pay so much, no more.

sense.def:
Izraz
and so on
ali
and so forth
uporabimo na koncu seznamov, da tako pokažemo, da obstajajo še druge stvari iz iste skupine, ki jih nismo omenili.

seg.quote: You can program a computer to paint, play chess and so on.

sense.def:
Izraz

uporabimo, kadar navedemo samo približno količino ali velikost.

seg.quote: We arrived a month or so ago.

seg.quote: Just as one gesture can have many different meanings, so many different gestures can have the same meaning.

sense.def:

cit.quote: ne toliko ... kot; ne ... pač pa
